text:
Welcome to beautiful Boston, Massachusetts,
a vibrant, eclectic and exciting waterfront

city set in the breathtaking region of New
England.

Hello, I’m Victoria. If you’re looking
for the ideal holiday destination, with diverse

shopping options, vibrant neighbourhoods and
natural beauty, join me for the next few minutes

to experience some of the highlights of this
wonderful city.

For the perfect balance of historic and hip,
a great way to begin your visit is to head

to Back Bay or Beacon Hill, for some serious
retail therapy. You’ll be in the heart of

“trendiness” and have a wide selection
of department stores, independent shops and
high-end boutiques to choose from.

Next, add a little diversity and fresh air
to your visit and take a boat ride out to

the Boston Harbor Islands National Park. Within
just 20 minutes, you’ll be surrounded by

pristine nature, where you can hike, bike,
kayak, fish or simply watch wildlife.

In total, there are 1600 acres and 35 miles
of undeveloped shoreline to explore.

When you get back to the city, why not visit
the Rose Kennedy Greenway, one and a half

miles of contemporary urban parks, right in
the heart of this buzzing metropolis? Escape

for a few hours and check out public art,
fountains, food trucks, flowers in bloom and
even a carousel.

Next stop! Faneuil Hall Marketplace, an indoor-outdoor
shopping center close to the waterfront. The

marketplace is as alive today as it was in
1742. This iconic mixed-use venue includes

a wide array of shops, restaurants, bars,
world-renowned street performers and historic

Faneuil Hall, also known as “The Cradle
of Liberty”,

Before leaving town, you may also want to
do a little more shopping at Copley Place,

the Shops at the Prudential Center, or Macy’s
located in Downtown Crossing, the Outlets

at Assembly Row or Cambridgeside Galleria.
Looking for more? Take a short drive from

downtown to Legacy Place, Wrentham Village
Premium Outlets or Patriot Place in Foxborough.

With a wide variety of things to do and see,
this diverse city has plenty to offer everyone!

Be sure to include Boston, Massachusetts,
on your next US-bound holiday!
